item.description: Let's play with plants and make some pretty containers.  Bring a container and something for us all to munch on.  Bring a chair if you can. Gloria has a pool so bring your swimsuit and a towel too in case it gets hot.  See you all on Sunday!
item.how_to_find_us: GG sent her address to all yes RSVPs. If you haven't received it please email her or me.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Make beautiful containers at GG's House in Dracut
